pullRequest.body:
We introduce lemmas on fractions which shall be useful when constructing the preadditive structure on the localized category.


---

- [x] depends on: #11721

Can you extend `LeftFractionâ‚‚`? Or is that annoying for some reason?

It should be possible, but it would require introducing an alternate constructor `LeftFractionâ‚ƒ.mk'` with reordered arguments. In the tactic state, it may also make annoying expressions appear like `LeftFractionâ‚ƒ.toLeftFractionâ‚‚.f`. I am not sure it would be a gain? (`LeftFractionâ‚ƒ` shall be used only in the proof of the associativity of the addition of morphisms in the localization of a preadditive category.)
